name: alex2gpt
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chat g. p. t.
des:
This is an Alexa skill that uses the OpenAI API to generate responses from the ChatGPT model.
You can send two requests per day for free. I always use the latest model – currently 4o or 4o-mini.

Beyond that, you have two options:
 1. You can purchase unlimited access by saying “buy unlimited access” or “I want to buy unlimited access” once you’ve started the app (this works with “Alexa, start Chat GPT” – GPT pronounced in English).
 2. You can use your own API key – visit https://alexa.onlypxl.com/ for this.
There, you’ll need your user ID. To get it, simply ask “What is my user ID?” when the skill is running.
On the website, you can also set up a custom prompt – for example, “Always end responses with a chuck norris joke.”

Please understand that, temporarily, the API key option also requires a subscription. With the small fee, you support the server operation costs, such as those for Hetzner, AWS, and OpenAI. If these costs can be covered by regular “unlimited access” subscriptions, I will reduce or eliminate the prices – so check back occasionally.

The subscription for accessing the skill with your own API key is called “release". You can purchase it by saying “Buy the release.”

For any issues, please email onlypxlreply@gmail.com, including your user ID.

This skill is brand new, so there may be bugs. But maybe we can create an awesome skill together!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
